channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Swollen rivers flood towns in US South after dayslong deluge of rain
item.description: Rivers rose and flooding worsened across the U.S. South and Midwest, threatening communities already waterlogged and badly damaged by days of heavy rain and storms that killed at least 18 people.

item.title: RFK Jr. visits epicenter of Texas measles outbreak after death of second child who was infected
Judge says deportation of Maryland man to an El Salvador prison was ‘wholly lawless’
